Activity: Log in to the EHR system and check for any emails or updates.
Finalize any remaining data abstraction tasks to reach the 200-record goal. Prioritize any readily available electronic records.
Conduct a thorough review of all 200 abstracted records to ensure data quality and consistency. Correct any errors or omissions.
Document any challenges encountered during the week's data abstraction process. Prepare a brief summary of lessons learned or suggestions for improvement in future data collection efforts.

Prepare a report summarizing the week's data abstraction activities, including the number of records abstracted, any challenges encountered, and recommendations for future improvements. Send the report to @HIS-1 and @DA-1.
Back up all abstracted data to a secure location to prevent data loss. Ensure that the backup is properly labeled and organized for easy retrieval.
Attend weekly team meeting (if scheduled) to discuss progress, challenges, and next steps. Share any relevant findings or insights from the week's data abstraction activities.
Complete all administrative tasks, such as updating time sheets and submitting expense reports. Prepare for the weekend.
